description:
Kogoro, Conan, and Ran accompany actresses Haneki Ryo and Sawazaki Reina to the on-location shoot of their gourmet travels TV show. After several attempts on her life, Ryo feels she is in danger. Kogoro is hired to protect Ryo as her bodyguard and determine who is trying to kill her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ボディーガード毛利小五郎
